content.p: The General Studies modules comprise four broad categories. UNM offers the following modules in the 2022 NEW MPU Structure. Level Modules - Malaysian student Modules - International student U1: Appreciating philosophy, values and history U2: Mastering humanity skills / U3: Broadening knowledge about Malaysia Bahasa Kebangsaan A (MPU 3212)*/ Tamadun Islam dan Tamadun Asia (MPU 3342) / Leadership (MPU 3332) Malaysian Studies III (MPU 3352) / Leadership (MPU 3332) U4: Developing practical community-minded skills** Community Service Project (MPU 3412) *This module is compulsory for students who do not have credit in the Bahasa Melayu subject in SPM (Sijil Pelajaran Malaysia/Malaysian Certificate of Examination). **It is compulsory for all students to complete 30 hours of community service project designated by the General Studies Department, this subject to the predetermined conditions set out by the General Studies Department. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8244 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
